licenseTranslations.firstPar: HERE SHOULD BE A TRANSLATIONS OF PRIVACY POLICY AGREEMENT

aboutUs.title: About us
aboutUs.firstParagraph: Scientific Equipment is a small research and production company specializing in the development, production and implementation of high-precision equipment and related products. Our developments are used in leading institutes of the country.
aboutUs.secondParagraph: The team is made up of specialists and developers with experience in science, engineering and innovation.

gotQuestions.title: Got any questions?
gotQuestions.text: Order a call back, the manager will contact you and explain everything

equipment.descOne: PMB-2b manual motor drill for geological, geophysical, geochemical and other sampling
equipment.descTwo: 10 liter water tank with hand pump.
equipment.descThree: High-strength, non-magnetic stainless steel drill bit

whatWeDo.title: What do we do?
whatWeDo.text: Scientific Equipment is engaged in the development, design and creation of mechanisms for various purposes. Our main areas of activity are the development of high-temperature and vacuum equipment, as well as mechanized systems with high requirements for manufacturing accuracy.
